title: So much fun! Thank you Riot :)
body:
OK you guys, 

I'm level 28 now, and I created a post a week ago to find some friends, and I'm very grateful for the new friends I made, they're all from different levels, and very helpful. I learn new things about my laning phase and stuff, and I see the game in a new light! So this post is basically a big thank you to Riot for all the fun! I've had my best game EVER 10 minutes ago with Astanio and John Cleese, two other summoners, and I got SMASHED real good hahaha 4 14 something, but man, that was so intense I can tell I never had this much fun playing against all these Diamonds and Platiniums :)

See y'all around, I'm heading back to the rift!

Aerie

replies.body: Because of the intense amount of negativity on the boards I feel really weird reading this...

Here, have a smile, never feel weird for appreciating something :)
Unless it's eating babies. Don't eat babies :(
agreed

Glad you're enjoying the game! 

GL on the Rift!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Your positivity is warming.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Oh now you're making me blush :3

I would be so interested in this! I have only been playing with people who are from Bronze 5-3 and I don't really learn as much. I would love to play with Silver to Diamond, Plats and Challengers in the future just to learn more on how to play, what kind of plays to make. Would be a great experience to get out there and see how others play in that environment.

Make a post that doesn't sound like you're being victim friend. We all get frustrated at some point, but it's a game, and frustration should only come at things that are important, like not being able to eat or stuff like that. I'm done being a philosopher now, I'm hungry hahahaha {{champion:96}} 
But more seriously, create a new topic and ask kindly? :) Like Cinderella's mother said in the recent movie: Have courage and be kind.

The happiness, it BURNS!

_-_ Board complainers
I have a solution for Board complainers though: being happy. Nothing too difficult ae? x)
To children, the best medicine is deadly bitter

I still think your the next Raydere once you get a bigger champion pool!

^Yeah I said it.

Ah shush you. I just started, I googled him then watched some videos of his matches on Youtube, I am WAAAAAAAY behind x) Last game I played with Cait I had 166 CS in  20:39. He's way over that though. 
PS: score 5 0 2, my support was very dedicated.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} but stay away from dem h8rs

I invite dem haters too you know. Might not be much to make them feel like there are way better things to do like enjoying the game they're playing. LoL for instance. Come haters, let me teach you a thing or two about life.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Yay sooo good to see a happy positive post!
I'm happy you're happy :D Everyone is happy! Yay! ^^ {{summoner:31}}
Congrats man! It's a great game and once you REALLY get into it and understand all the little complexities hidden behind each Champion and Item etc. it'll only get more fun!

I'm doing this right now actually :) I have this new goal which is to have a 5 Mastery thing with my favourite champions. For now, I have mastered Miss Fortune, Karma, Janna and Sona. Next are Caitlyn, Tristana and Jinx and Ashe ^^
Good to hear someone new to the game is enjoying their experience. I hope you continue to enjoy this game for a long time =)
So do I! :) Have a good day ^^

You are lucky you were found by people who actually wanted to help you. Those people are a rarity, most players in that skill bracket could not give a fuck about new players trying to learn and would rather make things harder for you because they don't want other people to succeed or inspire them to try.

You will come across players on both sides that will just rip into you, when both your team and opposing team gang up to make you feel like worthless trash. Remember this is a game, not a "sport" as so many people try and say because no sport in the fucking world lets people get away with the level of crap that gets heaped onto some of us by this entitled crapsack excuse of a playerbase.

Don't pay for pixels. You may need the cash down the line for things you actually need AND CAN ACCESS when you want.

nice man
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Hehehe :) I know right?
This game will be dead to you in a couple of years, run while you still can
I almost wanna report you for negativity

He's not wrong. That doesn't mean he's right, but he's not wrong.

Eventually, the community and your teams in solo queue will become a drag and run you down. Enjoy the game in the time that you still enjoy it, I know i'm still enjoying it even if I get a bad team so long as I can consistently do well.
It might become dead to us one day, but new players like this guy are coming in every day. Just look at franchises like Warcraft, Magic the Gathering... etc.
Not just that but people will not play the game because they don't like it and then they will come back again. I took an eight month break and now I am into it more than before.

I'm running Infinity Edge first. Always. Wait, was my comment out of context? I have no time for negativity. If the game bores me in a couple of years, so be it. But right now, I'm having way too much fun to even think about that. Have a cupcake sweetie.
PS: to all of you guys who say "this guy" and stuff... I'd appreciate if you could use "she" instead? x)
